评论详情: I love that it’s a loose fit. It’s very comfortable and light. I haven’t worked out in it yet, but the fabric feels like it would definitely show sweat. The back doesn’t reveal too much and is nice and breezy. Going to get more colors.
Versatile top that takes me from the gym; meeting up for coffee and running errands.  Very soft fabric, quality is good, style is flattering. I love the soft aqua color.  Runs true to size.

评论概述: Cute top but not best for workouts
评论详情: Loved this top it was super cute and soft and stretchy and I got a ton of compliments on it, however, it shows sweat pretty well as you can see on my chest in one of the selfies I posted. I hate when shirts show sweat like that so that’s why I gave it 4 stars, but other than that it’s a great top. I sized up cause I like my shirts looser but you can totally get true to size.

This shirt is so cute. It’s the perfect cropped length, it sits at the top of my pants. The cut in the back is so cute. It keeps me cool on the hot days. The material is thin and breathable. I’ve had it for a few months now and it still holds up. My only complaint is it shows all my sweat and can take a while to dry.

I love the idea of this top. Loose and the cute overlap back. Also the modal fabric is great and thin.  However is shrinks a bit after washing and then it’s too short and gaps too much for my taste. Pretty dark Cornsilk blue color.
I like the style and the way it fits,will order more

my satisfaction with the quality of the product I recently purchased. The item fits perfectly, washed well, comfortable and has stayed true to its size and color as described. I believe it was worth the money spent. Thank you for providing such a high-quality product.
Great for working out or everyday. The cut in the back is super cute and the material is so soft. The neck line is a little bit more wide and I'd like but the overall fit is really cute.
This top was perfect! I use it every week
I love the length and the opening in the back. The material is lightweight, but not see through. Washes well and colorfast. I hang to dry. Love these tops.
Inhave purchased multiple colors because I love this top so much. I purchased both the medium and large, and love them both. Super soft.
I’m a small in most women’s tops but ordered a medium. The medium fit me and is cute with high rise shorts and pants. I’m 5’5”. Very cute! Size up if you want a more flowy look

评论概述: I haven’t tried it on yet!
评论详情: I’m waiting until I lose a little bit of weight Britt I wear this but I’m sure it’ll look good!

评论概述: Comfortable - best for around the house
评论详情: I usually wear a size Small, I ordered Medium and I am glad I did. This shirt is so soft and comfortable. I had originally bought this to workout in but I mostly wear it around the house. I bought both the Apricot and Light Blue colors. The apricot is see through but if you are wearing a nude or white sports bra underneath it does not look terrible. The light blue is also a little see through. The opening in the back comes up a little higher than I had hoped it would when I am moving around/working out, almost showing the bottom of my sports bra in the back. This can be washed normally but do not dry!!
DAUGHTER LOVES IT.
Fit great and nice and flowly!
Soft and comfortable.
Material feels good! Makes for a great yoga top. Light weight and airy.

These tops are super comfortable and breathable. After reading multiple reviews about the sizing, I ordered both a medium and a large. I’m 5,6 and about 140lbs and usually wear a medium in tops. I will say that the medium here fits a bit more like a small, particularly with the cropped fit. It’s still comfortable and easy to wear, but if I wanted to buy more of these I’d likely go with a large!

I got this in the medium (I’m typically a small or medium if I want some room) and a large, and the medium was too small. Even the large could be bigger considering the style, but I plan to keep the large.

A light top at the expense of the material being a little on the "slinky" side so i do hang this to avoid wrinkles rather than keep in a drawer. Its not terribly see thru and the cut of the back is nice. Fits true to size
Great for work g out or running errands

I follow the autumn color palette for my wardrobe, and this is true to color representation, so I love how it warms my skin tone. I love how the back design drapes down diagonally over my hips while exposing a bit of my lower back without being too revealing (e.g., I personally don't like showing my sports bra, and this top is low enough to hide your sports bra). The material is GREAT for intense cardio if you don't mind the sweat darkening the fabric a bit in the spots where you sweat, but (1) it dries quickly (maybe a little gross for some of you) and (2) you certainly don't feel drenched in sweat (I do boxing, and this top is gym/family-friendly and workout-friendly!). Would love this same design in a different fabric, perhaps, but I'm satisfied, nonetheless. I certainly love how I look in it! Thank you so much for crafting such a lovely belonging.
I like the shape of the shirt and how it’s breathable. I hate how it shows sweat. My higher quality athletic shirts do not do this.
great material, really cute true to sizing
Love this shirt. Have gotten a lot of compliments. You can dress it up or down

This shirt is good looking and launders well but sadly  the sizing is not true to size, it runs quite small all over. I purchased a large or one size up in order to have a bit of looseness this summer.  Also nice to have a looser top for summer that would then be slightly longer as to wear with leggings. Sadly this top fit like it was a size to small as it hugged my torso, the sleeves were tight as well as were uncomfortably short, feeling more like a “capped sleeve”  and fitting tight under the arms  Then to be the end all, the body length wasn’t near long enough , though II had ordered one size larger so that I’d feel a little more covered when wearing leggings!!!This top is so well made with a nice fabric if I were to buy it again I’d go up TWO sizes.So I’d you still want  this top  and don’t mind it feeling and looking very fitted, then order top two larger!!!

评论概述: OMG! These are SOOOO CUTE!!! 5 Stars - Ordering more colors!!
评论详情: LOVE THESE!!! 5 STARS or 6 if we could! These are super cute for the gym or in everyday wear! The cutout is very appropriate not over the top and the front isn't a crop top so it looks very modest and tasteful.  Color - Pink is hot pink and so cute. ALSO, does not fade Size - True to size Stretch - perfect stretch not too much but definitely enough Flattering - 100%!! Gives you the skinny look the way the cut out is in the back  Lots off colors to choose from, we should order them all!!!

I purchased this to wear on the plane during a recent trip but found that the fabric is extremely see through. Even when wearing a neutral color, you can see the bra/sports bra. Because it's a crop and open back, you can't wear a tank under it to hide the bra. I use this as a workout top (as it's intended for) but don't wear it out because it's very see through and I'd prefer to look more coordinated (and let's be honest, who ever has time to match their sports bra to their top lol). The plus sides are it's very light weight, soft, and flowy. I never overheat when working out in this top at home. I love the open back because it's breezy and offers ventilation. I would be open to trying another color to see how sheer the fabric is with a darker color (I purchased pink for reference).
Super comfortable and lightweight. Stretchy and good fit exercise as the open back cools you down. Size fit well
I took a gamble and sized up hoping it would be longer.  It's too short for my body.  It's very cute so I will give to my daughter who is much slimmer.

This shirt is insanely soft and flows nicely, not stiff at all. It’s incredibly flattering, and this is coming from someone who is 5’1.5”, 140, curvy with large hips and very fleshy arms lol. I got a medium and it fits perfectly. My arms and shoulders are what tend to be my problem area when it comes to clothes. Items may fit everywhere fine, but then it’s tight in my arms and shoulders. But this works great because of how stretchy and soft it is. I was debating between the large and medium and I’m glad I got the medium. I’m obsessed with the back!  The ONLY thing I’m bummed about is the light blue is EVER so slightly more deep than in the picture. It’s def still a light blue, but it’s not quite as baby light pastel blue as the image. But that’s the only complaint and that’s a minor one!

I love this crop work out shirt and plan to get more in different colors. I’m 5’8” and 175lbs (32FF) and I fit the medium. It’s a great length for crop, paired with high waisted leggings I’m not worried about exposing myself.
I went with the suggested size and wish I would have sized up. The shirt is incredibly soft and I do plan on returning and ordering the next size.

This shirt is soft and comfortable but get wrinkles very easily. Even if I fold it right after it comes out of the dryer, it gets very wrinkly while in my drawer. Lots of color choices I would purchase again despite the wrinkles
I am learning Pilates and I enjoy these tops. Only thing I did purchase some in a larger size due to my own l comfort level.
Fits a little small but still works for me .I am big chested  .Washes well too .I bought XS and wear a 36d bra .SLIGHTLY  thin but still good quality

I started off with 5 stars for these shirts because they were great right out of the package.  However I have two of them that I hardly ever wear because they wrinkle SO FAST and I don’t have time for that nonsense for athletic wear!
I love this shirt! The fabric is very breathable and comfortable. I have worn it as a workout shirt, but also just for casual everyday wear and it is great.
I like the top, and it is buttery soft. I’m not totally sold on the way it looks on me personally. I do like how the back allows for a more “open” feel with it having an open back.

It is always difficult to shop online for clothing.  This top looked stylish and airy, so I went for it, and even ordered one size up to make sure the slit, open part would not leave too much in the air. Well...I don't know if their sizes are for children,  but Medium (I always order Small for anything T-shirt- like) got to past my navel, and wasn't so in loose... The feel of the shirt is very soft and light, as expected.  It would be comfortable if fitting, but I don't think would really be flattering if rolls of fat or skin pour through. In other words,  measure yourself if you want to order the right size for you,  and don't go by their sizing chart.
Cute workout top. Very cropped.
I like to wear a light top over my yoga tank so I don’t have to worry about too much “chest exposure.” This is cute and comfortable. Easy to hand wash and hang dry.
This is a great top to throw on after yoga, but it’s not necessarily good quality to work out in it. It’s very thin lightweight and I feel like after a couple washes it won’t last.
This shirt looks as advertised. It is airy and comfortable. The material is soft and relatively thin. I’ll be wearing it a lot for pickleball
Super cute and cooling top! Definitely size up if you want it a little bit loose.

My new favorite top! I love how it covers enough on the front side but has a slit in the back. It still covers my sports bra. The material is soft but kind of thin, which I guess makes it more breathable. I got the black color and it looks nice.

评论概述: Really cute and comfortable but size down
评论详情: I just got this shirt today. I tried to upload a picture of the back of it but it didn't work. For reference, I'm 5'4, about 118 lb, and I got a medium as per other reviewers. I'm going to keep the shirt but I'm going to buy another one in a small because it's really loose. It's very cute, though. Definitely recommend the style!
I love this shirt. Great fit and not too short. Very cool and breathable but I also think it will be great for fall. I wore it golfing with a skirt and it was very cute
Great shirt, nice material, runs slightly small
Great shirts. I will buy in all colors. I am a fitness instructor and really only teach in this. It’s so cute. Perfect thickness. Great fit. Overall a fantastic shirt.
It’s a little thin and wrinkles easily, but it’s soft and stretchy. Very comfy for working out and seems like decent quality.

I ordered Medium at first because I’m in between Medium and Large. It was a little too small so returned and got a large. Fits great. Really cute top, a little different than most of my other tops. I’m thinking about getting another in a different color.
Great out of the package but after just 1 wash, it looked worn and bumpy.

评论概述: Thin fabric but very cute top
评论详情: Very wrinkled but I still like it. Make sure you wear a padded bra. Very thin fabric.
This tshirt is great for working out. It is very thin and soft, however it is definitely of cheaper material - but that would go along with the price you pay.

I have this top in 3 different colors, love the brightness of the colors. However, the fit of these definitely runs large. Also when you wash and dry them you have to either pull them out of the dryer the second the dryer is done or you will be forced to iron them. Love wearing them but they're a pain to travel with because of all the wrinkles that set in if they're not hung on a hanger. Which definitely sucks.
Love these tops I ordered 3 of them So soft and lightweight Medium fit perfectly true to size Could size down if you like it more form fitting
I bought this top in 4 different colors and I just love them.
Wrinkles very easily, cute top but I tend to sweat a lot with the material if I wear it to pickleball. Not sure what it is

This is so cute, covers most of stomach and only shows little of the back. Fabric is SOFT and super stretchy. Perfect combo of coverage yet stylist. Bought in several colors. Medium size was just right for my body type.
While I love the looseness of shirt and back style keeping you cool.. Sweat bubbles form on the fabric, which I think it’s odd! I bought a large I  am 145lbs  5’6inc

评论概述: True to size, felt nice to wear.
评论详情: Wore once, came from dryer very wrinkled. So, iron out, maybe. If you buy it, just don't put in dryer. My bad.

Shirt is soft and a good length. But Sizing is a little off. The Large fit more like a medium and the XL fit more like a large. Be very careful washing. Even after washing and hang drying the shirt shrunk tremendously. Cannot wear or nor am able to return.

评论概述: Must have for a Warm and Humid Work Environment
评论详情: The Mippo Workout Tops for Women are a game-changer in warm and humid work environment.  The combination of fashion-forward design, comfortable fabric, and functional details makes them a top-tier choice for any job the requires clothes that allow you to be active and comfortably cool at the same time. With a solid five-star rating, I can confidently say that these tops have exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking to elevate their comfort or workout wardrobe. Embrace both style and performance with Mippo!  The variety of colors is an added bonus!

I’m obsessed with this shirt. It’s super lightweight, and comfortable. It’s not cut too high so it looks like a crop top. You can wear it for anything. I wore to on a date to brunch, came home and changed into a sports bra and did yard work it in. I’m ordering about 10 more.

Would size up on this, I normally get a L and I would have gone XL to get more of a flowy feel/look. The fabric is soft and fit wells but I think it shrunk after washing because it sits/fits a little higher and tighter than I was expecting

Lo bueno de el modelo es que es suelto por el diseno en la espalda no se apreta cuando te mueves , los brazos no apretan para nada la tela es muy suave y de calidad ,es transparente tendras que usar algo mas pero es ideal para usarlo bajo enteritos y vestidos de verano sin tirantes que es lo que yo buscaba me a encantado ,es corta pero queda debajo del ombligo ,me encanto para lo que necesito
Exactly as listed, soft and great quality.

The first time I try this on, the fit the color every thing is perfect, the softness of the material, you can never go wrong with this top, you better get it,  or you will be sorry, I'm telling you, I don't write reviews, but this time I'm well please.

This shirt is super lightweight, not at all clingy and long enough to work for those of us on the taller side (5’9”, 150 lb) who like a good crop top but don’t want everything exposed.  The hem hits right at my belly button and looks super cute with high waste leggings.  I ordered a medium and it’s  little on the flowy side so I just also ordered a small to see if I like the fit better.  TBC!

评论概述: Love this top, will get in other colors
评论详情: This top is very thin, flowy and comfortable.  Washes up well so I will be buying in other colors.
Perfect sizing, I’m 5’8” and have a larger chest so always worried about the fit depending on the brand. The quality of the material is lightweight and breezy for the summer.

It looks cute and there's a long list of do not that are attached to the shirt it says even though it says in the instructions here you can wash it by Machine the first instruction says wash by hand then it says washing cold water only do not iron do not dry clean do not use fabric softener. That picture I posted is how it came out the dryer. Who wants to wear that anywhere when it says do not iron? It is soft. And that's about the only attribute I would agree with that it's soft
This shirt is exactly how the photos and description tell you. It is such a soft thin material. I am so happy I bought this shirt 😎
I love the look of this shirt but didn’t want it super tight. I sized up 1 for the perfect fit. The back of this shirt is super cute and adds more than just a regular T-shirt.

The color (red) was fine, the fabric was very light weight, the cut of back is cute, but the top was just too big for me all over (shoulders, bust, and length in front).  I ordered a M/6-8 because that's what I normally wear but the fit was more like a size 12.  Looking back at the size chart, I now see that the bust of the M/6-8 top is given as 38" which is bigger than most M/6-8 tops ... maybe that's the problem?

评论概述: Right length of crop, tight in arms
评论详情: The shirt is cropped by not too short- great to wear with high waist leggings without showing midriff. The arms are a little tighter than I wish though, so if you have bigger upper arms you may not like the fit.
It’s hard to find tops like this when you are tall…they are always SO short. This one hit right where it should.
Material wasn't very nice, didn't like the way it was sewn.
Loved the soft texture of the fabric. The shirt falls a little below my waist as I’m very petite. Very cute with leggings.
Nice thin modal shirt, a tad short but nice.

I just received my order today and had to wear it right away. The fit is perfect per the size chart, it’s made well and the material is cool and comfortable. I love it so much I had to order 3 more. They have different styles that are just gorgeous too. Can’t wait for them to come in. I did read some reviews that said after washing it was hard to get the wrinkles out so I’ll update if I find that same problem. For now I really don’t think it’s going to be a problem. I highly recommend this company and their product to anyone, plus you can’t beat the price.
This is a beautiful tee shirt, it can be worn at the gym or with jeans. I love it and will be purchasing more
Because of the open back the shirt can be wider than expected. I ordered a small and at and below breasts it was too loose and wide
I love the back detailing and the material is soft. Easy to wash & I hang dry. Con: if you are like me you will see arm sweat if you’re going hard at th gym.
Fit is great very true to size and the material just can’t be beat for the price! Most shirts this price are polyester this is quality natural material it’s a lot like bamboo!
The fabric is very soft and confortable, falls great on the front, it's a great fit! I bought pink and white and will get  more colors. I love these shirts, super cute and confortable!

I got this shirt because I started going to the gym and got a pair of Nike high waisted sweat shorts to wear with cropped shirts, issue was I didn't have any so I got this one. I love it! Very soft and stretchy! Will be buying in different colors!
Absolutely love the fit, it’s true to size and the color is beautiful! Will be ordering more!!
Love this tee. It’s super soft, fits well, and looks cute with high waisted leggings. For reference I ordered a L and I’m a size 8-10, 36DD. I’ll probably order another color.
hides back rolls and isnt too clingy in the front either

I like the color and opening in the back. The material however is not sweat proof and this won’t be a gym shirt now. Its more suited for a non-strenuous park walk. Would love to see more shirts like this in a tech material. I’m 5’4 and 135-140 lbs. Sized medium works well.

评论概述: Nice but wish it was sweat proof
评论详情: Seems like good quality and it’s kinda soft but silky too. I just don’t like how it shows sweat - it’s not sweat proof.

I’m not really a crop top kinda girl due to my shape but this top is so flattering with high waisted pants. It lands right at the belly button. Size up. I usually wear a medium and got large and it’s perfect. Took off one star for the sizing and it arrived smelling very strong so try to wash it before the first time you wear it.
Very cute top.  Love the back detail.  Fabric is nice and soft and light.
This shirt is so light weight and comfortable! I want it in every color.
This shirt is wonderful and I bought in three colors as well as for my daughter. It is super soft
This does not look good on me. I am too boxy.

Super soft and comfy. I like the back and how it's a little open. The pink is a little sheer so I would recommend wearing white or tan underneath if that bothers you. Totally will be buying more to workout out in and to just wear during the hot summer.
